constituent: grate, finger, fingers, guess, house, ritual, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, crotch, altar, show, two, small
koohiiStory1: If you mis-guess the cheese you´ll grate your fingers on the cheese-grater (happens to me all the time).
koohiiStory2: Ouch! Guess how many fingers I just grated in the grater? (Edit: OR: Ouch! Guess what I just grated in the grater? -- my finger!).
kunYomi: す.る、す.れる、-ず.れ、こす.る、こす.れる
readingExamples: 擦る (す.る), 擦れる (す.れる)
words: to touch lightly, to take a percentage (from)
to rub, to chafe, to wear, to become sophisticated
